entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Port Hawkesbury
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:29 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -1.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Port Hawkesbury Airport 5:49 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -1.5°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas late this evening and overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy changing to a few flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning and early in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. High plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Monday 13 February 2023
